channel.description: Recent content in themes on Wisdom Theme DemoSite

item.title: Features
item.description: Shortcodes Callouts {{<callout>}}This is a callout!{{</callout>}} :bulb: This is a callout! {{<callout emoji=":fire:">}}This is a callout with a custom icon!{{</callout>}} :fire: This is a callout with a custom icon!

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
